concept.title: Case 16: Support for carry over buckets

section.title: Overview
section.p: The rollover bundles or carry over for bundles allow carrying over the unused value left over in a bucket at the end of the reset cycle of data subscription.

Bob has an iPhone subscribed to a monthly bundle for a data bucket enabled with carry over feature. After the subscription renewal, the remaining unused units of the data bucket are moved to the carry over bucket. The current balance of the carry over bucket is not greater than the Carry Over Transfer Limit when the renewal period of the bundle is set as Unlimited.

section.title: Flow of events
section.p: Bob has an iPhone subscribed to a monthly bundle for a data bucket enabled with carry over feature:

ul.li: At the subscription creation, the value of shared monthly regular bucket is 1500 MB and the current balance of the carry over bucket is zero.

When a data usage of 1000 MB is done, the data is consumed from the regular bucket. After the call execution, the current balance of the main bucket is 500 MB and current balance of the carry over bucket is zero.
After the first subscription renewal, the current balance of the main bucket is 1500 MB and current balance of the carry over bucket is 500 MB.

When a data usage of 100 MB is done, the data is consumed first from the regular bucket. After executing the data call, the current balance of the main bucket is 1400 MB and current balance of the carry over bucket is 500 MB.
After the second subscription renewal, the current balance of the main bucket is 1500 MB and current balance of the carry over bucket is 1500 MB (maximum carry over balance).

section.title: Provisioning

note.p: Ensure that after creating a record, you distribute it to ME. Otherwise, the provisioning will not be successful.
